title: What is the meaning of the Red Hot Chili Pepper lyric “give it away, give it away, give it away now” in the song Give It Away? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s about selflessness, letting go, giving away what you have so that others may enjoy it. Anthony Kiedis grew up with a materialistic philosophy…if you don’t get it for yourself, nobody will give it to you. One day, he was rummaging through his then-girlfriend’s (Nina Hagen) closet, and found a jacket that he liked. She told him to keep it. He was blown away that anyone would give him something like this, and she told him that giving it away made her happier than keeping it. It completely changed his outlook on life, and he began to look at things differently. So, give it away.
